verses.text: \w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* subscribers \w were|strong="H3881"\w* Nehemias, Athersatha \w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H8269"\w* Hachelai, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Sedecias,
Maazia, Belgia, Semeia: these were priests.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H8098"\w* Levites, Josue \w the|strong="H8098"\w* son \w of|strong="H3548"\w* Azanias, Bennui \w of|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H8098"\w* sons \w of|strong="H3548"\w* Henadad. Cedmihel,
\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3881"\w* brethren, Sebenia, Oduia, Celita, Phalaia, Hanan,
\w The|strong="H1137"\w* heads of \w the|strong="H1137"\w* people, Pharos, Phahath Moab, Elam, Zethu, \w Bani|strong="H1137"\w*,

\w And|strong="H4409"\w* \w the|strong="H1196"\w* rest of \w the|strong="H1196"\w* people, priests, Levites, porters, \w and|strong="H4409"\w* singing men, Nathinites, \w and|strong="H4409"\w* all that had separated themselves from \w the|strong="H1196"\w* people of \w the|strong="H1196"\w* lands to \w the|strong="H1196"\w* law of God, their wives, their sons, \w and|strong="H4409"\w* their daughters.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w could|strong="H5971"\w* \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* promising \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* brethren, \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w chief|strong="H3548"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w came|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* promise, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* swear \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w would|strong="H3548"\w* walk \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w which|strong="H0802"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w gave|strong="H0995"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hand \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Moses \w the|strong="H3605"\w* servant \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w would|strong="H3548"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* keep \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* commandments \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* judgments \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* ceremonies.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* daughters \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land, not \w take|strong="H2388"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* daughters \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* sons.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w things|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w sell|strong="H5414"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H5414"\w* \w things|strong="H0834"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w use|strong="H3947"\w*, \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w sell|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sabbath day, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w buy|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sabbath, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* holy day. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H0834"\w* leave \w the|strong="H0853"\w* seventh year, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* exaction \w of|strong="H1121"\w* every \w hand|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w we|strong="H3117"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* ordinances \w for|strong="H0776"\w* ourselves, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w give|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* third \w part|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w side|strong="H3027"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* work \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* house \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*,

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* leaves \w of|strong="H1004"\w* proposition, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* continual sacrifice, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* continual holocaust \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sabbaths, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* new moons, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* feasts, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* holy \w things|strong="H4687"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sin offering: \w that|strong="H8141"\w* atonement might \w be|strong="H0430"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* Israel, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H8141"\w* \w use|strong="H5656"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w we|strong="H3605"\w* cast lots \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* priests, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Levites, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* people \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* wood, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w might|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* brought \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* fathers \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w set|strong="H4150"\w* \w times|strong="H4150"\w*, \w from|strong="H5921"\w* year \w to|strong="H5921"\w* year: \w to|strong="H5921"\w* burn \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* altar \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w as|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* written \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* law \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Moses:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* we \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* first fruits \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H1486"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H1004"\w* all \w fruit|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w every|strong="H8141"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* firstborn \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* sons, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* cattle, \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* written \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* law, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* firstlings \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* oxen, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* sheep, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* offered \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* priests \w who|strong="H3605"\w* minister \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H0929"\w* we \w would|strong="H3548"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* meats, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* libations, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fruit \w of|strong="H1121"\w* every tree, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* vintage \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* oil \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* storehouse \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tithes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* ground \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Levites. \w The|strong="H0853"\w* Levites \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* receive \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tithes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* works \w out|strong="H3789"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cities|strong="H0935"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Aaron \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* offer \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tithe|strong="H4643"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w storeroom|strong="H3957"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* treasure \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w For|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3881"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w carry|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w treasury|strong="H0214"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H1121"\w* corn, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* wine, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* oil: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sanctified vessels \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* singing \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* porters, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w ministers|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* we \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* forsake \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
